reviews.review_msg: most of the exam question were solely based on the textbook. what will screw you over is the group presentations in the tutorials. hardest marker ever. Another thing he did was make 25 marks on the final on 2 little videos watched in lecture. I didnt go to that one class and got screwed. SO UNFAIR

She is the best teacher I have ever had. She is extremely helpful and she truly cares about your success. She is very entertaining and she makes the content extremely interesting. She is a legendary teacher. Love her!
